column210: gRPC takes care of all the underlying plumbing and simplifies the programming paradigm. However, to some dedicated REST purists, this may seem like an over-complication. So to make it more simple
column211: From my perspective, stuff like RESTful APIs has always been a "hack" to ride along on old protocols. If something comes along which lets me use a stack more suitable for modern languages and still be agnostic to which language specifically is being used by a client AND increase performance dramatically, then I am going to be the first person to jump on the bandwagon!
